name: King of the Hill Map Showcase
name_original: King of the Hill Map Showcase
description:
This is a build of a first-person level map design for a class I took during the Spring 2023 semester. The entire project was built using Unreal Engine 5.1. This was built with the intent of possibly becoming a first-person multiplayer shooter map, however, that functionality will not exist in the project. This is purely a showcase of the map layout and design.

To learn about the thought and development process, check out my devlog video going over everything!

I used the City of Brass asset pack from the Unreal Marketplace to build the environment.
